feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:20AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED SURF FROM POINT HOPE TO THE BERING STRAIT THROUGH MONDAY... North northwest winds 15 to 30 mph are expected today through Monday along the coast, south of Point Hope to the Bering Strait, causing elevated surf with minor beach erosion for north facing coastlines.
